item.title: E-commerce Data Analysis: Product Recommendation
item.description: Loading libraries library(dplyr) library(magrittr) library(Hmisc) library(lubridate) library(caret) library(GGally) library(reshape2) library(recommenderlab) Loading data online <- read.csv("C:/Users/amfua/Documents/RepositoryBlog/data/Online.csv") # renaming names(online) <- c("Transaction.ID", "Date","Product.SKU", "Product","Product.Category","Quantity.online", "Avg.price","Revenue","Tax","Delivery") productmat <- dcast(online, Transaction.ID~Product.SKU, value.var = "Quantity.online", na.rm=FALSE) productmat[1:5,1:5] ## Transaction.ID GGOEA0CH077599 GGOEAAAB034813 GGOEAAAB034814 ## 1 16679 NA NA NA ## 2 16680 NA NA NA ## 3 16681 NA NA NA ## 4 16682 NA NA NA ## 5 16684 NA NA NA ## GGOEAAAB034815 ## 1 NA ## 2 NA ## 3 NA ## 4 NA ## 5 NA First user transactionID = 16679
